summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2633, for the improvement of the alley in block 42, Capitol Hill Addition, Division No. 6, being the alley between 22nd Avenue North and 23rd Avenue North, from East Aloha Street to East Prospect Street, by paving the same with asphalt laid upon a proper concrete foundation, under Ordinance No. 30907 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
